alert.note: Alert for Genesee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Genesee County through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clio to near Flint to near Byron. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mount Morris and Beecher around 555 PM EDT. Flint and Crossroads Village around 600 PM EDT. Grand Blanc, Burton and Otisville around 605 PM EDT. Otter Lake around 610 PM EDT. Davison around 615 PM EDT. Goodrich around 625 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Atlas, Thetford Township, Argentine, Rankin and Genesee. People attending Downtown Montrose and Downtown Flint should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
